resources.string:
"Auto-Backup now uploads all photos and videos from selected sources and no longer supports time-specific backups. Given the change, Google has turned off Auto-Backup for this device.
All your content remains private unless you choose to share it. %s"
Auto-Backup is on, and your photos and videos are being safely uploaded to your Google account. %s
Photos and videos will be backed up
Automatically back up to the cloud
Edit horizontal offset. Range %d to %d per cent
Edit vertical offset. Range %d to %d per cent
Edit zoom percentage. Range %s to %s per cent
Horizontal selection: %d to %d per cent. Vertical selection: %d to %d per cent.
No Google+ people notifications, navigate to people suggestion page
Prevent this post from being shared outside of %1$s
Selecting this will remove any circles and people that you have selected to share with.
You may know %s. Add her to see more!
You may know %s. Add him to see more!
You may know %s. Add them to see more!
"Great! Now you'll see more posts from %s"
You must sign in to an account before you can upload media.

Sharing your activity helps your friends find cool people and posts. People you select here may see updates about your future Google+ activity. As always, updates from private posts will only be seen by people who the post is shared with.

{AUDIENCE,select, EVENT{Shared with guests}PUBLIC{Shared publicly}LIMITED{Shared privately}EXTENDED_CIRCLES{Shared with extended circles}DOMAIN{Shared with {DOMAIN_NAME}}PRIVATE{Not shared}other{Unknown}}
"Visible to everyone in this person's circles, plus all the people in their circles."

{AUDIENCE,select, EVENT{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo shared with guests.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos shared with guests.}}}PUBLIC{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo shared publicly.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos shared publicly.}}}LIMITED{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo shared privately.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos shared privately.}}}EXTENDED_CIRCLES{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo shared with extended circles.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos shared with extended circles.}}}DOMAIN{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo shared with {DOMAIN_NAME}.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos shared with {DOMAIN_NAME}.}}}PRIVATE{{PHOTO_COUNT,plural, =1{{ALBUM_TITLE}. One photo not shared.}other{{ALBUM_TITLE}. # photos not shared.}}}other{Unknown}}

Server problem. Please try again later.

"Your %1$s collection has been suspended because it still contains content that violates our User Content and Conduct Policy.

%3$s on Google+.

The collection is viewable only by you. The collection and its content will be deleted within 2 months. To keep your collection active, please remove the offending content and submit an appeal."

"Thank you for submitting your collection for review. Reviews are generally completed within a few days. During this time, your collection will be viewable only by you. If the review determines that your collection still violates our User Content and Conduct Policy, it will remain suspended.

We're sorry for the inconvenience."
Collections that promote hatred or violence based on race, ethnic origin, religion, disability, gender, age, veteran status, sexual orientation or gender identity are not allowed
Collections that share pornographic or sexually explicit material are not allowed
Collections that offer to sell regulated goods or services are not allowed
Collections that share unwanted promotional or commercial content, or unwanted or mass solicitations, are not allowed
Collections that share abusive material are not allowed
Content that promotes gratuitous violence, or graphic content intended to shock and disgust, is not allowed on Collections or anywhere else
Swipe to change colour. The currently selected colour is %s
Unable to update cover photo or colour
You have blocked the owner of this collection. Unblock the owner if you want to follow it.
I understand that I am deleting this collection and all its posts, and that I will not be able to undo it.
"Be careful! You can't undo Collection deletion."
Edit visibility of collections that you follow
Collection with the same name already exists. Try another name.
"You are following too many collections. Congratulations, you've reached the limit. :)"
"You have created too many collections. Congratulations, you've reached the limit. :-)"
Plus page collection creation not allowed
You are unfollowing too many collections.
Choose who can see your collection. Give followers a place where they can get just the right stuff.
Start a collection to group your posts by topic. Post photos, videos & more.
"You aren't displaying your followed collections on your profile."
Post pinned to top of collection
Post unpinned from top of collection
"The owner of the collection will be able to see that you're following it."
Collections that you follow will be displayed on your profile to people who can see the collection.
Show collections that you follow on your profile.

"Your %1$s collection has been suspended because it contains content that is %2$s. This violates our User Content and Conduct Policy

%4$s on Google+.

The collection and its contents are currently viewable only by you. Please remove the offending content and submit an appeal to have the suspension lifted. Visit the Help Centre to learn more about how to manage collections on Google+.

If you don't take action within two months, your collection and its content may be deleted."
This feature is not yet implemented.
"This comment is hidden because you've blocked the commenter."

%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.

"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."

Deleted items are removed from this device, as well as all albums and posts they are part of. They will also be removed from any Google services they are associated with like Blogger.
Try swiping to the side to see more options.
"People are sharing their location with you, but they're in circles that you've filtered out. Use \"Filter map\" to add the circles they're in, in order to see their locations."
You are not sharing your location with %s. Change this in Location Sharing Settings.
You are sharing your city location with %s. Change this in Location Sharing Settings.
You are sharing your pinpoint location with %s. Change this in Location Sharing Settings.

Location History is required for Location Sharing and also provides useful information, such as automatic commute predictions, improved search results and more useful ads on and off Google. To do this, Location History creates a private map of where you go with your signed-in devices.

To create this map, Google will regularly obtain location data from devices where you have enabled Location History, including when you aren’t using a specific Google product.

You can pause Location History whenever you like, but this doesn’t delete any previous activity. Learn more.
Location Sharing has been enabled, but Location Reporting is off
None of the people in your circles are sharing their location with you yet. Do you want to ask them to do so?
%s is sharing her location with you.
%s is sharing his location with you.
%s is sharing their location with you.
Location Sharing allows the people you choose to see your location and places (like home and work) across Google products, such as Google Now and Google+.

"Let people know that you’re in town or on your way to an event. It makes meeting up easier. You'll be able to change who you share with or turn off Location Sharing at any time.
Learn more"

Location Sharing allows you to share your current location from Location Reporting on your device with people you choose. Learn more

People you share your location with can see your current location across Google products, including Google+ and Google Now. They can also see your places, such as home and work.

Turn on Location Reporting to share your current location with others.

This will turn on the Location Reporting and Location History features, which will allow Google to periodically store the location data of this device associated with your account for use across Google products. Learn more
Account (%1$s) turned on Location Sharing from the website. In order to share your location, Location Reporting must be turned on.
Turn on Location History to share your current location with others.
Do you want to share your location with %s?

%s will see your precise, current location
